name: America's Army: Proving Grounds
description:
Do you have what it takes to train like a U.S. Army Soldier?

Take on the role of an 11B Infantryman practicing combat maneuvers at JTC Griffin, a fabricated training MOUT (military operations on urban terrain) environment. This training is crucial to your success as part of a Long Range Combined Arms â€“ Recon (LRCA-R) unit, a full spectrum capable team that embarks on special operations missions behind enemy lines.
Key Features

    You are a U.S. Army Soldier
    Two Game Modes with 4 objective types
    Character and Weapon customization
    Teamwork is Critical
    Train in Shoot Houses
    Mission Editor and Steam Workshop
